content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add ENUM_UNIT_VARIANT_REGEX pattern to mcp/src/brp_tools/request_handler/format_discovery/constants.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding regex pattern
Add ErrorPattern::EnumUnitVariantMutation variant to detection.rs
Add detection logic in match_all_patterns function using the new regex
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after detection changes
Update can_handle in enum_variant.rs to recognize EnumUnitVariantMutation pattern
Implement transform_with_error handling for EnumUnitVariantMutation in enum_variant.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after transformer changes
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings (mid-point check)
Fix any clippy issues following rules (no dead code, no underscore prefixes)
Update registry_discovery.md test to use correct empty path syntax for mutations
Add enum mutation error message validation test to registry_discovery.md
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after test updates
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings (final check)
Fix any final clippy issues following rules
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
CodeReview: Task subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review suggested changes from code review with user
